<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Seer of the Dead](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=243)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 31 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

You have long been gifted with the ability to see and speak with the departed. This could have manifested at your birth or when a chance encounter linked you inextricably to the spirits of the dead. Their constant presence might feel like a curse, or it might provide you with welcome companionship.

 You gain one ability boost. It must be to **Constitution** or **Wisdom**.

 You're trained in [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) and [Undead Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8). You gain the effects of the [_spirit sense_](/Spells.aspx?ID=718) spell at all times.
name: Seer of the Dead
